# Government Tender Announcement: Professional Audit Support Services

## Important Details
- **Reference Number**: PW-22-01007959
- **Amendment Number**: 2
- **Solicitation Number**: 10075366
- **Publication Date**: September 22, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: October 26, 2022, at 2:00:00 PM

## Background
Public Works and Government Services Canada (TPSGC) invites PASS SA holders to submit bids for the establishment of a contract under the Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) Supply Arrangement.

## Eligibility
Only PASS SA holders currently holding a valid PASS SA for Stream 1: Internal Audit in the National Capital Region are eligible to compete.

## Contract Terms
- **Contract Period**: One (1) year, with two (2) one-year irrevocable options allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract.

## Accessibility
In accordance with the Treasury Board Contracting Policy, accessibility is an essential requirement for this tender. Solicitations must meet applicable accessibility criteria.

## Instructions to Bidders
- Any questions or inquiries should be emailed to Daniel Michaud at [daniel.michaud@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:daniel.michaud@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
- Solicitation documents are available in PDF format only.

## Contact Information
- Contact Name: Michaud, Daniel
- Email: daniel.michaud@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- Phone: 819-858-8483

## Notice
It is the bidder's responsibility to ensure they meet the eligibility requirements and accessibility standards outlined in this solicitation.
